text: kya tumane yah samajh rakha hai ki jannat mein pravesh pa jaoge, jabaki abhee tum par vah sab kuchh nahin beeta hai jo tumase pahale ke logon par beet chuka? unapar tangiyaan aur takaleefe aaee aur unhen hila maara gaya yahaan tak ki rasool bol uthe aur unake saath eemaanavaale bhee ki allaah kee sahaayata kab aaegee? jaan lo! allaah kee sahaayata nikat hai
